script: A serene moment as the sponge hovers just above the dewy skin, ready to bounce foundation onto the face, creating a satisfying blend and a luminous glow.
caption: Embrace the radiant glow with a gentle touch. Watch as the foundation seamlessly blends into fresh skin for that perfect finish.
